revised_title: Cytological Changes in the Lachrymal Gland and Protoplasmic Granules
tldr: The author discusses the fuchsin-methyl green method for studying mitochondria and cytoplasmic granules in the lachrymal gland. They review previous methods and conclude that this method is the most suitable for fixed material. This research contributes to understanding the structure and function of cells.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Cell Biology
